title: champ pick bug
body: hi... just in my promo I was in champ select... after bans on my turn I should select a champ... but i cant click on accept, so nothing happens, I lost my promo without entering game + few minutes have to wait for next match... I would understand, If my net connection broke or simmilar, but I also write to chat at selection without any problem... so it's fokin weirdo... Anybody else have the same issue, or is it just 1-time experience?

replies.body: Hi, this is the italian board, you must speak italian there or post your problem in the EN board ;) Thanks!
